code_dossier.name: en.json
code_dossier.description: English language localization file containing all UI text strings for the application, organized by functional modules.

data.detailed_description: This component is a JSON-based internationalization (i18n) configuration file that provides English translations for the entire application's user interface. It contains structured key-value pairs grouped under semantic namespaces such as 'common', 'main', 'reader', 'aisprite', 'settings', etc., each corresponding to different parts of the application. The values include UI labels, prompts, tooltips, error messages, and form placeholders used throughout the app. This file enables multilingual support by allowing runtime switching between language packs without modifying source code. It supports dynamic content insertion via template placeholders (e.g., {name}, {length}) for contextual messaging in dialogs and notifications.
responsibilities: Provide English translations for all user-facing text in the application
Support dynamic message templating with variable interpolation for context-aware UI messages
Organize localization strings by functional module (e.g., settings, reader, feeds) for maintainability
Enable consistent UI text rendering across components through centralized string management
